page.syntax: V INNER_ROUND_RECT(N XPos,N YPos,N Width,N Height,N RoundWidth,N RoundHeight)

argument.name: XPos
argument.description: The horizontal coordinate of the upper left corner of the shape. Larger values move right.

argument.name: YPos
argument.description: The vertical coordinate of the upper left corner of the shape. Larger values move down.

argument.name: RoundWidth
argument.description: The horizontal stretch of the corner's curve

argument.name: RoundHeight
argument.description: The vertical stretch of the corner's curve.

page.description: Draw the inside of a rounded rectangle.
page.discussion: The INNER_ROUND_RECT() function draws a round cornered rectangle on the bitmap. There is no border. The fill color is the current brush color. Compare to the FILL_ROUND_RECT()and ROUND_RECT()functions. Limitations: Used only in the Code sections of UI_BITMAP_DRAW(), UI_SCREEN_DRAW(), and UI_PRINTER_DRAW().

section.example: ui_bitmap_create("test",4,2) ui_bitmap_draw("test",<<%code% inner_Rect(0,0,4,2) set_brush("green") set_pen("black") inner_round_rect(1, .5, 2, 1, .5, .25) %code%) ui_dlg_box("","{image=test}")
